description: Create an Ozinga TK batch file export.
permissions: User must be authorized to create the referenced organization invoices batch file (delegated OrganizationInvoicesBatchFilePolicy create?).
side_effects: Creates an Ozinga TK batch file export; unless dry-run is set, submits the processed organization invoices batch file to the Ozinga TK integration and records export results or errors.
validation_notes: organization_invoices_batch_file is required. The batch file must belong to a valid Ozinga organization, must be a TK batch export file, and must have completed processing (status processed); exports are rejected if formatting failed or if processing is incomplete. Export requires a valid exporter integration; errors are returned if no exporter is available or it cannot connect.

flags.name: --organization-invoices-batch-file
flags.description: Organization invoices batch file ID. Example: 123.

flags.name: --dry-run
flags.description: Validate and preview export without sending.
